title: Google Meet will soon remind you when you’re the last person in the room
content:
Google has announced two new improvements coming soon to Google Meet. If you tend to attend meetings with Google Meet running in the background, it’s easy to forget to leave the meeting once it’s ended. If that is something that happens to you frequently, this upcoming feature will come in handy. When you’re the only

The post Google Meet will soon remind you when you’re the last person in the room appeared first on xda-developers.
description: When you’re the only person in a meeting for more than five minutes, Google Meet will show a pop-up telling you that you're the only one here.
